summary: 我们规划在河岸观景台靠近南侧阶梯的空地安装装置，先整理地面再摆放气球骨架。我会让阿南负责物资汇总，琳带两名志愿者布线，文学社负责循环广播。
commands: execute in world positioned 125.22 65.00 -207.61 rotated 32.00 0 run function gm4_balloon_animals:build/setup_showcase
execute in world positioned 125.22 65.00 -207.61 rotated 32.00 0 run function gm4_balloon_animals:build/populate_showcase
